name: CompositeCollection_clearTest
description: Unit tests for the clear functionality of the CompositeCollection class.

test_cases.name: testClear
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the CompositeCollection when it contains multiple collections.

test_cases.name: testClearWithEmptyComposite
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the CompositeCollection when it is empty.

test_cases.name: testClearWithSingleCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the CompositeCollection when it contains a single collection.

test_cases.name: testClearWithMultipleCollections
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the CompositeCollection when it contains multiple collections, including an additional one.
